name: Burg_49
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with sea-related idioms
diet heavy on salted fish and kelp
local craftsmen specialize in boat repair and net-making
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no long-range mind influence; navigational auguries cannot replace charts
notes: population unknown; functions as a reagent transshipment stop
built on a sheltered inlet with modest quay infrastructure
